ARC_Gnosis.notes: The definitive Gnosis-trained ARC agent. Trained on non-linear solutions.

ARC.notes: Animus Recurrens Cogitans (ARC). The final SAGA v3.0 agent.

hf_phi3.notes: Microsoft Phi-3 Mini hosted on Hugging Face. Very fast and reliable.

ollama_codegemma.notes: Google CodeGemma. A fast, reliable specialist for code and JSON.

ollama_gemma2b.notes: Google Gemma 2B. A lightweight and reliable local model.

ollama_phi3.notes: Fast and capable small language model running locally via Ollama.

gemini_flash.notes: Google Gemini 1.5 Flash. A powerful, high-speed model for Saga generation.
